name: search_files
description: Search the local file index for documents matching a natural language query.

natural_query.description: Natural language description of the files to locate.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default 10).

name: run_command
description: Execute a trusted local automation command (launch apps, control windows, manage audio).

command.description: Spoken-style command such as 'open discord' or 'take screenshot'.

name: build_file_index
description: Scan allowed folders and refresh the on-disk file index.

extra_paths.description: Optional additional folders to include in the scan.

max_file_size_mb.description: Skip files larger than this size in megabytes (default 50).

name: search_memory
description: Look up stored facts or history entries that mention a given topic.

query.description: Keyword to match within memory facts and history.

name: window_control
description: Control and switch between windows and apps on Windows. Use this for commands like 'minimize this window', 'switch to Discord', or 'launch Steam'.

target_app.description: Optional app label such as 'discord' or 'steam'.

monitor.description: Optional monitor hint such as 'left', 'right', 'primary', or 'monitor 2'.

name: voice_typing_control
description: Enable or disable dictation mode and optionally type text into the active window via pyautogui.

name: gamebar_capture
description: Trigger Xbox Game Bar recording shortcuts (record last 30 seconds or start/stop capture).

name: open_website
description: Open a website in the user's browser. Supports Chrome specifically when requested.

url.description: The site to open. Can be a domain like 'facebook' or a full URL.

browser.description: Optional browser hint such as 'chrome' or 'default'.

name: open_path
description: Open a file or folder on the local Windows system by friendly name or path.

target.description: The file, folder, or app the user wants opened (name, friendly phrase, or absolute path).

name: open_file_location
description: Find a file by name or description using file_index.json and open the folder that contains it.

target.description: Description or name of the file whose location should be opened (e.g., 'desktop.ini in documents', 'rocket league log').

name: search_web
description: Search DuckDuckGo for fresh public web results when the user needs up-to-date info.

query.description: Natural language search string to send to DuckDuckGo.

max_results.description: Maximum number of web results to return (default 5).

name: fetch_page
description: Download a URL and return the cleaned, visible text so the user can read it.

name: summarize_page
description: Fetch a URL and return a short excerpt so the user can get the gist quickly.

url.description: Fully-qualified URL whose contents should be summarized.

max_chars.description: Maximum number of visible characters to return (default 1500).

name: get_time_date
description: Retrieve the current local time, ISO date, and weekday.

name: get_location
description: Fetch the user's general location (city/region/country) and coordinates via ipinfo.io.

name: get_weather
description: Retrieve the current weather from Open-Meteo (returns both Celsius and Fahrenheit) for provided or auto-detected coordinates.

lat.description: Latitude in decimal degrees. Optional when the assistant should auto-detect location.

lon.description: Longitude in decimal degrees. Optional when the assistant should auto-detect location.

name: get_sunrise_sunset
description: Get today's sunrise and sunset times for specific coordinates.

lat.description: Latitude in decimal degrees. Optional when the assistant should auto-detect location.

lon.description: Longitude in decimal degrees. Optional when the assistant should auto-detect location.

name: get_forecast
description: Fetch a short multi-day weather forecast including min/max temperature and summary.

lat.description: Latitude in decimal degrees. Optional when the assistant should auto-detect location.

lon.description: Longitude in decimal degrees. Optional when the assistant should auto-detect location.

days.description: Number of days to include (default 3, maximum 7).

name: get_air_quality
description: Retrieve the most recent US AQI reading and pollutant levels.

lat.description: Latitude in decimal degrees. Optional when the assistant should auto-detect location.

lon.description: Longitude in decimal degrees. Optional when the assistant should auto-detect location.

name: get_environment_overview
description: Combine current weather, sun times, forecast, air quality, and simple alerts for a location.

lat.description: Latitude in decimal degrees. Optional when the assistant should auto-detect location.

lon.description: Longitude in decimal degrees. Optional when the assistant should auto-detect location.

days.description: Number of forecast days to include when summarizing (default 3, maximum 7).
